tabular_learner(dls, layers=None, emb_szs=None, config=None, n_out=None, y_range=None, ps=None, embed_p=0.0, use_bn=True, bn_final=False, bn_cont=True, loss_func=None, opt_func='Adam', lr=0.001, splitter='trainable_params', cbs=None, metrics=None, path=None, model_dir='models', wd=None, wd_bn_bias=False, train_bn=True, moms=(0.95, 0.85, 0.95))
